name: The Witching Hour (Perlite)
description:
(tw: blood mention, death)

In this twine game you play as an insomniac tourist in Edinburgh, Scotland. There’s a recurring theme in my projects of sleeplessness and dread. My first stab at a “horror” game, based on my own experiences in Scotland and Scottish folklore.

A bit more ambitious than my other projects with five endings, one secret ending, multiple variables, and around 100 passages.
